name: Cube Battle Royale: 15 Players, 1 Keyboard!
description:
Primitives series: "Cube Battle Royale"

Local multiplayer game for 15 players on one keyboard. Get as many people around your keyboard as possible. Everyone takes turns pressing an unclaimed key that they can reach, which activates their player and tells them which three buttons are theirs. Then you try to knock off all your opponents and stay alive!
